mapper.sql: select u.user_id, u.dept_id, u.user_name, u.nick_name, u.email, u.avatar, u.phonenumber, u.user_type, u.password, u.sex, u.status, u.del_flag, u.login_ip, u.login_date, u.create_by, u.create_time, u.remark, u.party_member_id, u.ethnicity, u.birth_date, u.education, u.category, u.application_date, u.activist_date, u.development_object_date, u.probationary_member_date, u.full_member_date, u.is_missing, u.is_mobile, u.image_path, d.dept_id, d.parent_id, d.ancestors, d.dept_name, d.order_num, d.leader, d.status ,d.dept_img as dept_status, r.role_id, r.role_name, r.role_key, r.role_sort, r.data_scope, r.status as role_status from sys_user u left join sys_dept d on u.dept_id = d.dept_id left join sys_user_role ur on u.user_id = ur.user_id left join sys_role r on r.role_id = ur.role_id
mapper.select:
select distinct u.user_id,u.dept_id,u.user_name,u.nick_name,u.email,u.phonenumber,u.status,u.create_time,u.party_member_id,u.ethnicity,u.birth_date, u.education,u.category,u.application_date,u.activist_date,u.development_object_date,u.user_type, u.full_member_date,u.is_missing,u.is_mobile,u.image_path from sys_user u left join sys_dept d on u.dept_id = d.dept_id left join sys_user_role ur on u.user_id = ur.user_id left join sys_role r on r.role_id = ur.role_id where u.del_flag = '0' and (r.role_id != #{roleId} or r.role_id IS NULL) and u.user_id not in (select u.user_id from sys_user u inner join sys_user_role ur on u.user_id = ur.user_id and ur.role_id = #{roleId})
AND u.user_name like concat('%', #{userName}, '%')
AND u.phonenumber like concat('%', #{phonenumber}, '%')
${params.dataScope}
select user_id, user_name from sys_user where user_name = #{userName} and del_flag = '0' limit 1
select user_id, phonenumber from sys_user where phonenumber = #{phonenumber} and del_flag = '0' limit 1
select user_id, email from sys_user where email = #{email} and del_flag = '0' limit 1
mapper.insert: insert into sys_user( user_id, dept_id, user_name, nick_name, email, avatar, phonenumber, sex, password, status, user_type, create_by, remark, party_member_id, ethnicity, birth_date, education, category, application_date, activist_date, development_object_date, probationary_member_date, full_member_date, is_missing, is_mobile, image_path, create_time ) values ( #{userId}, #{deptId}, #{userName}, #{nickName}, #{email}, #{avatar}, #{phonenumber}, #{sex}, #{password}, #{status}, #{userType}, #{createBy}, #{remark}, #{partyMemberId}, #{ethnicity}, #{birthDate}, education, #{category}, #{applicationDate}, #{activistDate}, #{developmentObjectDate}, #{probationaryMemberDate}, #{fullMemberDate}, #{isMissing}, #{isMobile}, #{imagePath}, sysdate() )
mapper.update: update sys_user set status = #{status} where user_id = #{userId}
update sys_user set avatar = #{avatar} where user_name = #{userName}
update sys_user set password = #{password} where user_name = #{userName}
mapper.delete: update sys_user set del_flag = '2' where user_id = #{userId}
